name: Sun Bum SPF 30 Scalp & Hair Mist
description: Towel? Yep. Flip-flops? Yep. Hat hair? Nope. This quick-drying mist keeps you scalp and hair sun-safe, without needing a hat. Whether you're on a tropical beach, or out in the backyard, Sum Bum does its part to help keep you safe from harmful UV.Broad-spectrum UVA and UVB protection.Non-greasy formula.Water resistant rating of 80 minutes.Gluten, paraben, and cruelty free.Ingredients: homosalate 10%, octisalate 5%, octocrylene 4%, avobenzone 3%, alcohol denat. (70.10%), acrylates/octylacrylamide copolymer, polyester-8, butyloctyl salicylate, algae extract, laminaria digitata extract, sunflower seed extract, caprylic/capric triglyceride, glycerin, fragrancezinc oxide 20.0%, water, coconut oil, butyloctyl salicylate, diheptyl succinate, methyl dihydroabietate, shea butter, fragrance, capryloyl glycerin/sebacic acid copolymer, sodium stearoyl glutamate, cetearyl alcohol, cocoa seed butter, coco-glucoside, tocopherol, microcrystalline cellulose, cellulose gum, bisabolol, cetyl alcohol, arachidyl alcohol, behenyl alcohol, arachidyl glucoside, polyhydroxystearic acid, sodium hyaluronate, sodium gluconate, phenoxyethanol, ethylhexylglycerin and citric acid.
